TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UTF7Encoding extends System.Text.Encoding

summary.span: 表示 Unicode 字符的 UTF-7 编码。

span.span: Represents a UTF-7 encoding of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将一组 Unicode 字符转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解码是转换为一系列 Unicode 字符编码字节的序列的过程。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. Utf-7 编码为 7 位 ASCII 字符的序列表示 Unicode 字符。The UTF-7 encoding represents Unicode characters as sequences of 7-bit ASCII characters. 此编码支持某些协议需要它的最常见的电子邮件和新闻组协议。This encoding supports certain protocols for which it is required, most often email or newsgroup protocols. 由于 utf-7 不是特别安全或可靠，并且大多数新式系统允许 8 位编码，因此通常应优先于 UTF-7、utf-8。Since UTF-7 is not particularly secure or robust, and most modern systems allow 8-bit encodings, UTF-8 should normally be preferred to UTF-7. > [!NOTE] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 出于安全原因，应用程序应使用， ，或并启用错误检测。For security reasons, the application should use , , or and enable error detection. 有关 Utf 和其他编码支持的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 方法确定多少个字节进行编码的一组 Unicode 字符和方法执行实际的编码。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 同样，方法确定多少个字符产生的字节序列进行解码并和方法执行实际解码。Likewise, the method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the and methods perform the actual decoding. 对应于 Windows 代码页 65000。 corresponds to the Windows code page 65000. > [!NOTE] > 如果该对象进行序列化和反序列化使用不同的.NET Framework 版本，不会保留 utf-7 编码对象的状态。The state of a UTF-7 encoded object is not preserved if the object is serialized and deserialized using different .NET Framework versions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用Unicode 字符的字符串进行编码并将其存储在字节数组中。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to encode a string of Unicode characters and store them in a byte array. 请注意，当为一个字符串进行解码的字节数组，不会丢失数据。Notice that when the byte array is decoded back to a string, no data is lost. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/CPP/snippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/CS/snippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding Example/VB/snippet.vb#1)]

span.span: Understanding Encodings

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个实例，它不允许可选字符。This constructor creates an instance that does not allow optional characters. 调用构造函数是等效于调用构造函数采用`allowOptionals`参数并指定`false`为该参数。Calling the constructor is equivalent to calling the constructor that takes an `allowOptionals` parameter and specifying `false` for that parameter. 如果实例允许可选字符，替换相应的可选字符，而不是修改后的 base 64 字符编码的 Unicode 码位。If an instance allows optional characters, Unicode code points are encoded with a corresponding optional character instead of a modified base 64 character. 可选字符是感叹号 ("！")，反斜杠 ("\\")，竖线 ("|")，双引号 (""")，数字符号 （"#"）、 美元符号 （"$"）、 百分比符号 （"%"）、 and 符 ("&")、 星号 ("\*")，以分号 （";"），向左尖括号 ("\<")，右尖括号 (">")，左大括号 ("{")，右花括号 ("}")、 左的方括号 ("[")，右方括号 ("]")，等号 （"="）、 at 符号 ("@")，扬抑符 ("^")、 下划线 ("_")，和重音符强调文字颜色 ("")。The optional characters are exclamation point ("!"), backward slash ("\\"), vertical line ("|"), double quote ("""), number sign ("#"), dollar sign ("$"), percent sign ("%"), ampersand ("&"), asterisk ("\*"), semicolon (";"), left angle bracket ("\<"), right angle bracket (">"), left curly bracket ("{"), right curly bracket ("}"), left square bracket ("["), right square bracket ("]"), equal sign ("="), at sign ("@"), circumflex accent ("^"), underscore ("_"), and grave accent ("\`"). > [!NOTE] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 出于安全原因，建议您的应用程序是使用， ，或并启用错误检测。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个新实例，并显示编码的名称。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance and display the name of the encoding. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/CPP/ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/CS/ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor1 Example/VB/ctor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果实例允许可选字符，替换相应的可选字符，而不是修改后的 base 64 字符编码的 Unicode 码位。If an instance allows optional characters, Unicode code points are encoded with a corresponding optional character instead of a modified base 64 character. 可选字符是感叹号 ("！")，反斜杠 ("\\")，竖线 ("|")，双引号 (""")，数字符号 （"#"）、 美元符号 （"$"）、 百分比符号 （"%"）、 and 符 ("&")、 星号 ("\*")，以分号 （";"），向左尖括号 ("\<")，右尖括号 (">")，左大括号 ("{")，右花括号 ("}")、 左的方括号 ("[")，右方括号 ("]")，等号 （"="）、 at 符号 ("@")，扬抑符 ("^")、 下划线 ("_")，和重音符强调文字颜色 ("")。The optional characters are exclamation point ("!"), backward slash ("\\"), vertical line ("|"), double quote ("""), number sign ("#"), dollar sign ("$"), percent sign ("%"), ampersand ("&"), asterisk ("\*"), semicolon (";"), left angle bracket ("\<"), right angle bracket (">"), left curly bracket ("{"), right curly bracket ("}"), left square bracket ("["), right square bracket ("]"), equal sign ("="), at sign ("@"), circumflex accent ("^"), underscore ("_"), and grave accent ("\`"). > [!NOTE] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 出于安全原因，建议您的应用程序是使用， ，或并启用错误检测。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个新允许可选字符的实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance that allows optional characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/CPP/ctor-boolean.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/CS/ctor-boolean.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.ctor2 Example/VB/ctor-boolean.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个对象是否相等，如果它们都可以允许或不允许可选字符，并且如果它们的基础和属性相等。Two objects are equal if they both either allow or disallow optional characters, and if their underlying and properties are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要计算确切的数组大小，需要来存储所产生的字节，应用程序使用。To calculate the exact array size that requires to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要计算的最大数组大小，该应用程序应使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常允许您分配的内存越少，而方法通常更快地执行。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以返回所需字符数组进行编码的字节数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the number of bytes required to encode a character array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要计算所需的确切的数组大小若要存储所产生的字节，该应用程序使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要计算的最大数组大小，该应用程序应使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常允许您分配的内存越少，而方法通常更快地执行。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 数据转换，如从流中读取的数据可能仅在连续的块中可用。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在这种情况下，或者如果数据量很大，因此需要划分为较小的块，该应用程序应使用或提供方法或方法，分别。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 无效的字符编码为修改后的 base 64 字符。Invalid characters are encoded as a modified base 64 character. 出于安全原因，建议您的应用程序是使用， ，或并启用错误检测。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法进行编码的字符范围并将已编码的字节存储在某个范围的字节数组中的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to encode a range of characters from a and store the encoded bytes in a range of elements in a byte array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要计算所需的确切的数组大小要存储所产生的字符，使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting characters, use . 若要计算的最大数组大小，该应用程序应使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常允许您分配的内存越少，而方法通常更快地执行。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 数据转换，如从流中读取的数据可能仅在连续的块中可用。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在这种情况下，或者如果数据量很大，因此需要划分为较小的块，该应用程序应使用或提供方法或方法，分别。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 当遇到无效字节时，通常都会发出无效字节。When invalid bytes are encountered, generally emits the invalid bytes. 如果一个字节值大于 0x7F 十六进制，字节值为零扩展转换为 Unicode 字符，结果存储在`chars`数组，并且任何 shift 序列会终止。If a byte is larger than hexadecimal 0x7F, the byte value is zero-extended into a Unicode character, the result is stored in the `chars` array, and any shift sequence is terminated. 例如，如果要编码的字节十六进制 0x81，所产生的字符是 U + 0081。For example, if the byte to encode is hexadecimal 0x81, the resulting character is U+0081. 出于安全原因，建议您的应用程序是使用， ，或并启用错误检测。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Text.Decoder GetDecoder ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Text.Decoder GetDecoder() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDecoder () As Decoder
public: override System::Text::Decoder ^ GetDecoder();
override this.GetDecoder : unit -> System.Text.Decoder

summary.span: 获取可以将 UTF-7 编码的字节序列转换为 Unicode 字符序列的解码器。

span.span: Obtains a decoder that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

returns.span: 一个 ，用于将 UTF-7 编码的字节序列转换为 Unicode 字符序列。

span.span: A that converts a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将连续的字节块转换为连续的字符，方式类似于块此类的方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 但是，以便它可以正确地对跨块的字节序列进行解码的调用之间维护状态信息。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 还保留数据块的末尾的尾随字节并将在下一步的解码操作中的尾随字节。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和在网络传输和文件操作很有用，因为这些操作通常处理的数据而不是完整的数据流块。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来获取解码器将 utf-7 编码的字节转换字符序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain a decoder to convert the UTF-7 encoded bytes into a sequence of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CPP/getdecoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/CS/getdecoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetDecoder Example/VB/getdecoder-.vb#1)]

span.span: Understanding Encodings

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Text.Encoder GetEncoder ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Text.Encoder GetEncoder() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEncoder () As Encoder
public: override System::Text::Encoder ^ GetEncoder();
override this.GetEncoder : unit -> System.Text.Encoder

summary.span: 获取可将 Unicode 字符序列转换为 UTF-7 编码的字节序列的编码器。

span.span: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

returns.span: 一个 ，用于将 Unicode 字符序列转换为 UTF-7 编码的字节序列。

span.span: A that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将连续的字节块转换为连续的字符，方式类似于块方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method. 但是，以便它可以正确地对跨块的字节序列进行解码的调用之间维护状态信息。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 还保留数据块的末尾的尾随字节并将在下一步的解码操作中的尾随字节。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和在网络传输和文件操作很有用，因为这些操作通常处理的数据而不是完整的数据流块。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来获取用于将一系列字符转换为 UTF-7、utf 的编码器编码的字节序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain an encoder to convert a sequence of characters into a UTF-7 encoded sequence of bytes. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CPP/getencoder-.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/CS/getencoder-.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetEncoder Example/VB/getencoder-.vb#1)]

span.span: Understanding Encodings

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for the current object.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值方法并不适用于区分两个从另一个对象。The value returned by the method is not suitable for distinguishing one object from another. 如果你的应用程序需要的唯一哈希代码，应重写方法。If your application needs a unique hash code, it should override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetMaxByteCount (int charCount);

Public Overrides Function GetMaxByteCount (charCount As Integer) As Integer
public: override int GetMaxByteCount(int charCount);
override this.GetMaxByteCount : int -> int

param.name: charCount
param.span: 要编码的字符的数目。

span.span: The number of characters to encode.

summary.span: 计算对指定数目的字符进行编码时产生的最大字节数。

span.span: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

returns.span: 对指定数目的字符进行编码所产生的最大字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要计算所需的确切的数组大小若要存储所产生的字节，该应用程序使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要计算的最大数组大小，该应用程序应使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常允许您分配的内存越少，而方法通常更快地执行。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 是最坏的情况的数字，包括当前所选最差情形下。 is a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果有可能较大字符串中，选择了回退可以返回较大值。If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, can return large values. 在大多数情况下，此方法返回用于小字符串合理的数字。In most cases, this method returns reasonable numbers for small strings. 对于大型字符串，可能需要使用非常大的缓冲区，在极少数的情况下，超过了更合理的缓冲区中捕获错误之间进行选择。For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case that a more reasonable buffer is exceeded. 您可能还需要考虑不同的方法使用或。You might also want to consider a different approach using or . UTF-7、utf 时效率非常高的编码 ASCII 数据，每个字符，1 个字节是极其低效的其他数据。While UTF-7 is very efficient at encoding ASCII data, one byte per character, it is extremely inefficient for other data. 如上面，谈及：坏的情况下处理。As remarked above, deals with a worst case. 如果要进行编码的数据是很大程度上是 ASCII，尤其是 ASCII 字符聚集在一起，utf-7 需要执行非常多效率低于此方法返回的数字建议。If the data to be encoded is largely ASCII, and especially if the ASCII characters cluster together, UTF-7 is significantly more efficient than the number returned by this method suggests. 与无关。 has no relation to . 如果你的应用程序需要使用具有相似的功能，它应使用。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`。`GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法返回的最大指定的数目的字符进行编码所需的字节数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the maximum number of bytes required to encode a specified number of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CPP/getmaxbytecount-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CS/getmaxbytecount-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/VB/getmaxbytecount-int32.vb#1)]

param.span: 包含要解码的字节序列的字节数组。

param.span: 要解码的字节数。

summary.span: 将字节数组中某个范围的字节解码为一个字符串。

span.span: Decodes a range of bytes from a byte array into a string.

returns.span: 包含指定字节序列解码结果的 。

span.span: A containing the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据转换，如从流中读取的数据可能仅在连续的块中可用。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks. 在这种情况下，或者如果数据量很大，因此需要划分为较小的块，该应用程序应使用或提供方法或方法，分别。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 不提供错误检测。 does not provide error detection. 当遇到无效字节时，通常都会发出无效字节。When invalid bytes are encountered, generally emits the invalid bytes. 如果一个字节值大于 0x7F 十六进制，字节值为零扩展转换为 Unicode 字符，结果存储在`chars`数组，并且任何 shift 序列会终止。If a byte is larger than hexadecimal 0x7F, the byte value is zero-extended into a Unicode character, the result is stored in the `chars` array, and any shift sequence is terminated. 例如，如果要编码的字节十六进制 0x81，所产生的字符是 U + 0081。For example, if the byte to encode is hexadecimal 0x81, the resulting character is U+0081. 出于安全原因，建议您的应用程序是使用， ，或并启用错误检测。For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将字符串编码为一个字节，数组和字节解码为一个字符串。The following code example encodes a string into an array of bytes, and then decodes the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/CPP/getstring.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/CS/getstring.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.UTF7Encoding.getstring/VB/getstring.vb#1)]
